TopicTitle: Typing with Caps-Lock while naming flags results in strange capitalization

Articles.Content:
• KSP Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
  • OS: Windows 11 (22H2)
  • CPU: AMD R9 5900X
  • GPU: EVGA RTX 3080TI
  • RAM: 32GB DDR4
  • Description of bug
    • When naming a flag on Minimus I had caps-lock enabled and got alternating capitalization in letters. Also occurs when holding shift.
    • Expected Behavior
      • Text would read as " FIRST MINIMUS LANDER" when holding shift or enabling caps-lock.
    • Observed Behavior
      • Having text read as "FiRsT MiNiMuS LaNdEr"
    • Steps to Replicate
      • Plant a flag, hold shift OR enable caps-lock and type a site name.
  • Fixes / Workarounds: Typing text such as "FfIrSsTt MmIiNnIiMmUuSs LlAaNnDdEeRr" and deleting the non-capital letters.
  • Mods: None
  • Other Notes:
    • Does not affect plaque text.
    • Releasing shift and repressing it between each key stroke did not change the behavior.
    • Also occurs on Kerbin so it isn't just a location issue.
